name: MAT Miller Analogies Test Prep
description: MAT Miller Analogies Test Prep practice exam simulator is a free MAT exam prep app for Miller Analogies Test examination. It is a complete MAT exam study guide to prepare you for actual MAT exam by taking MAT practice exam , studying MAT flashcards and mock test. This application is designed to take MAT practice exam on the go without internet on your mobile device. MAT practice exam prep app record you performance and highlight the weaker area to let you focus on them while studying for miller analogies test exam. All questions are formulated by experts closer to the actual MAT exam.  Download NOW..!!  Categories:  1. Language & Vocabulary 2. Humanities 3. Social Sciences 4. Natural Sciences 5. Mathematics   MAT exam prep app will help you acquire information that will help you pass MAT test with ease.   Key features:  Two Study Modes: Flashcard and Practice Test  Detailed Explanation for each question  Feedback: Communicate with the MAT experts  MAT is an advanced mental ability test which requires you to provide solutions for the problems stated as analogies. It is used to access the candidates analytical skills which are required for success in both graduate school and professional life. The analogies included in the test are from various academic subjects and helps graduate schools to find potential candidates. Its been 50 yrs. Graduate schools are using this test for selecting the candidates for admission. Its been proved by research that the mat score has a positive correlation with subsequent success of candidate in graduate school.  ImpTrax Corporation is not affiliated with Miller Analogies Test (MAT).
